titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate specified entries of posters and refund excess duties or relieve the importer of record of any excess duties, penalties or associated fines.
